title: BioPharmX Corp Coverage Initiated at Sterne Agee CRT (BPMX)
content: Sterne Agee CRT initiated coverage on shares of BioPharmX Corp (AMEX:BPMX) in a report issued on Friday, AnalystRatings.NET reports. The firm issued a buy rating and a $3.50 target price on the stock. BioPharmX Corp (AMEX:BPMX) opened at 1.45 on Friday. The firm has a 50-day moving average of $1.84 and a 200 day moving […]
